subsection.name: Description
subsection.div: Checks that non-whitespace characters are separated by no more than one whitespace. Separating characters by tabs or multiple spaces will be reported. Currently, the check doesn't permit horizontal alignment. To inspect whitespaces before and after comments, set the property validateComments to true.
